data.comment: Bert Put starts the match. St. Truidense with the kick-off in Bruges.
The first-half has come to a close in Bruges.
In the minute 46, Bert Put blows to start the second-half. Brugge with the kick-off.
The home team replace Emmanuel Dennis with David Okereke.
David Okereke is on target to give Brugge a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 59, Mory Konate (St. Truidense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Keito Nakamura is on a sub for Wolke Janssens for St. Truidense.
Stefaan Van Winckel (St. Truidense) is making a second substitution, with Chris Durkin replacing Mory Konate.
In the minute 71, Philippe Clement is making the team's second substitution at Jan Breydel Stadium with Siebe Schrijvers replacing Hans Vanaken.
St. Truidense make their third substitution with Oleksandr Filippov replacing Samuel Asamoah.
Clinton Mata is replacing Ignace Van Der Brempt for the home team.
